item.text: “You are to make an altar for burning incense; you are to make it of acacia wood.

Its <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> is to be <st data-num="0520" class="">18 inches</st><n id="1" /> and its <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">18 inches</st>; it will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07251" class="">square</st>. Its <st data-num="06967" class="">height</st> is to be <st data-num="0520" class="">36 inches</st>,<n id="2" /> with its <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of one piece with</st> it.<n id="3" />

You are to <st data-num="06823" class="">overlay</st> it with <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>—its <st data-num="01406" class="">top</st>,<n id="1" /> its <st data-num="05439" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07023" class="">walls</st>,<n id="2" /> and its <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st>—and <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="02213" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> for it.<n id="3" />

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> for it <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> its <st data-num="02213" class="">border</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="06763" class="">flanks</st>; you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="06654" class="">sides</st>.<n id="1" /> The rings<n id="2" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">places</st><n id="3" /> for <st data-num="0905" class="">poles</st> to <st data-num="05375" class="">carry</st> it with.
You are to make the poles of acacia wood and overlay them with gold.
“You are to put it in front of the curtain that is before the ark of the testimony (before the atonement lid that is over the testimony), where I will meet you.

<st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> is to <st data-num="06999" class="">burn</st> <st data-num="05561" class="">sweet</st> <st data-num="06999" class="">incense</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st> by <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>; when he <st data-num="03190" class="">attends to</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="05216" class="">lamps</st> he is to <st data-num="06999" class="">burn incense</st>.<n id="3" />
When Aaron sets up the lamps around sundown he is to burn incense on it; it is to be a regular incense offering before the Lord throughout your generations.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">offer</st> <st data-num="02114" class="">strange</st> <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it, nor <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>, nor <st data-num="04503" class="">meal offering</st>, and you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05258" class="">pour out</st> a <st data-num="05262" class="">drink offering</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it.

Aaron is to make atonement on its horns once in the year with some of the blood of the sin offering for atonement; once in the year he is to make atonement on it throughout your generations. It is most holy to the Lord.”
The Lord spoke to Moses,

“When you take a census of the Israelites according to their number, then each man is to pay a ransom for his life to the Lord when you number them, so that there will be no plague among them when you number them.

Everyone who crosses over to those who are numbered is to pay this: a half shekel according to the shekel of the sanctuary (a shekel weighs 20 gerahs). The half shekel is to be an offering to the Lord.
Everyone who crosses over to those numbered, from twenty years old and up, is to pay an offering to the Lord.
The rich are not to pay more and the poor are not to pay less than the half shekel when giving the offering of the Lord, to make atonement for your lives.

You are to receive the atonement money from the Israelites and give it for the service of the tent of meeting. It will be a memorial for the Israelites before the Lord, to make atonement for your lives.”
The Lord spoke to Moses,

“You are also to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> a large <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03595" class="">basin</st> with a <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="03653" class="">stand</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="07364" class="">washing</st>. You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st> and the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">in it</st>,<n id="3" />

and <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> must <st data-num="07364" class="">wash</st> their <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> and their <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> it.<n id="1" />
When they enter the tent of meeting, they must wash with water so that they do not die. Also, when they approach the altar to minister by burning incense as an offering made by fire to the Lord,
they must wash their hands and their feet so that they do not die. And this will be a perpetual ordinance for them and for their descendants throughout their generations.”
The Lord spoke to Moses,

“<st data-num="03947" class="">Take</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07218" class="">choice</st> <st data-num="01314" class="">spices</st>:<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02568 03967" class="">12½ pounds</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="01865" class="">free-flowing</st> <st data-num="04753" class="">myrrh</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="04276" class="">half</st> that—about <st data-num="02572 03967" class="">6¼ pounds</st>—of <st data-num="01314" class="">sweet-smelling</st> <st data-num="07076" class="">cinnamon</st>, <st data-num="02572 03967" class="">6¼ pounds</st> of <st data-num="01314" class="">sweet-smelling</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">cane</st>,

and <st data-num="02568 03967" class="">12½ pounds</st> of <st data-num="06916" class="">cassia</st>, all weighed<n id="1" /> according to the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="08255" class="">shekel</st>, and <st data-num="01969" class="">four quarts</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="02132" class="">olive</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st>.
You are to make this into a sacred anointing oil, a perfumed compound, the work of a perfumer. It will be sacred anointing oil.
“With it you are to anoint the tent of meeting, the ark of the testimony,

the <st data-num="07979" class="">table</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>, the <st data-num="04501" class="">lampstand</st> and its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>, the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> of <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>,

the <st data-num="04196" class="">altar</st> for the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> its <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>, and the <st data-num="03595" class="">laver</st> and its <st data-num="03653" class="">base</st>.
So you are to sanctify them, and they will be most holy; anything that touches them will be holy.
“You are to anoint Aaron and his sons and sanctify them so that they may minister as my priests.

And you are to <st data-num="01696" class="">tell</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelites</st>: ‘<st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> is to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> my <st data-num="06944" class="">sacred</st> <st data-num="04888" class="">anointing</st> <st data-num="08081" class="">oil</st> throughout your <st data-num="01755" class="">generations</st>.

It must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="03251" class="">applied</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0120" class="">people’s</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">bodies</st>, and you must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="03644" class="">any like</st> it with the same <st data-num="04971" class="">recipe</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st>, and it must <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> to you.
Whoever makes perfume like it and whoever puts any of it on someone not a priest will be cut off from his people.’”
The Lord said to Moses, “Take spices, gum resin, onycha, galbanum, and pure frankincense of equal amounts

and <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> it into an <st data-num="07004" class="">incense</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="07545" class="">perfume</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="04639" class="">work</st> of a <st data-num="07543" class="">perfumer</st>. It is to be <st data-num="04414" class="">finely ground</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="02889" class="">pure</st> and <st data-num="06944" class="">sacred</st>.

You are to <st data-num="07833" class="">beat</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">some of</st> it <st data-num="01854" class="">very fine</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">some of</st> it <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> the ark of the <st data-num="05715" class="">testimony</st> in the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> of <st data-num="04150" class="">meeting</st> <st data-num="0834 08033" class="">where</st> I will <st data-num="03259" class="">meet</st> with you; it is to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">most</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> to you.
And the incense that you are to make, you must not make for yourselves using the same recipe; it is to be most holy to you, belonging to the Lord.
Whoever makes anything like it, to use as perfume, will be cut off from his people.”
